title: Error Code
description: Standard error code vocabulary for AdCP. Codes are machine-readable so agents can apply autonomous recovery strategies based on the recovery classification.

enumDescriptions.RATE_LIMITED: Request rate exceeded. Retry after the retry_after interval. Recovery: transient.
enumDescriptions.SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Seller service is temporarily unavailable. Retry with exponential backoff. Recovery: transient.
enumDescriptions.PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND: One or more product_ids are unknown or were never valid. Recovery: correctable (remove invalid IDs and retry, or re-discover with get_products).
enumDescriptions.PRODUCT_UNAVAILABLE: The requested product is sold out or no longer available. Recovery: correctable (choose a different product).
enumDescriptions.PROPOSAL_EXPIRED: The proposal referenced by proposal_id has expired. Recovery: correctable (run get_products to get a fresh proposal).
enumDescriptions.BUDGET_TOO_LOW: Budget is below the seller's minimum. Recovery: correctable (increase budget or check capabilities.media_buy.limits).
enumDescriptions.CREATIVE_REJECTED: Creative failed content policy review. Recovery: correctable (revise the creative per the seller's advertising_policies).
enumDescriptions.UNSUPPORTED_FEATURE: A requested feature or field is not supported by this seller. Recovery: correctable (check get_adcp_capabilities and remove unsupported fields).
enumDescriptions.AUDIENCE_TOO_SMALL: Audience segment is below the minimum required size for targeting. Recovery: correctable (broaden targeting or upload more audience members).
enumDescriptions.ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND: The account reference could not be resolved. Recovery: terminal (verify account via list_accounts or contact seller).
enumDescriptions.ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_REQUIRED: Account has an outstanding balance requiring payment before new buys. Recovery: terminal (buyer must resolve billing).
enumDescriptions.ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED: Account has been suspended. Recovery: terminal (contact seller to resolve suspension).
